siteMetadata.description: Tool to help you find excuses for running.
siteMetadata.title: I can't run because

node.excerpt: Wind is just air, try some of these:
Always good practice to run in the heat. Remeber some water and a hat.
Get a lamp, this one is basic.
Time to test out you rain gear.
Um, isn't that the point of running.
Try something else today like a walk or swim, there are other sports.
Have you tried walking or running slow source
You can always make time for a run
Does your run really need to be on Strava? I know its tough.
How did that happen? Maybe time to try barefoot running.
Try thinking about stuff and listening to the birds chirping.
Ok this might be a legit problem (saftey). Turn your friends into runners quickly.
